scripts.start: YAAGL_CHANNEL_CLIENT=hk4ecn vite build --mode="development" && cp './neutralino.js' './dist/neutralino.js' && mkdir -p yaaglwd && cp neutralino.config.json yaaglwd/neutralino.config.json && rsync -rlptu dist yaaglwd && rsync -rlptu sidecar yaaglwd && rsync -rlptu src/icons yaaglwd/src && neu run -- --path=./yaaglwd
